name: VIEW-09
description:
You don't know where you are.

Whatever roams the halls of this facility cannot be seen.

However, it most certainly can see you.

See what it sees. Know what it knows. Escape.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

A surprise to all,  a Unity horror game uploaded to itch.io.

I hope that I may subvert some expectations through unique mechanics.

Please leave a comment below and tell me if you liked it, or if you have any advice on where I can improve. 

Note: This game has a pixelated filter, which can make it look like the resolution is lower than it should be, however this is an intentional stylistic choice.

** RUNS ON WINDOWS 64 BIT**
